comments.body:
Since you manually packaged the license, please add a comment above the `license_file` line that includes a link to the following PR:

https://github.com/allenai/ai2thor/pull/407

This will be a visual reminder to check to see if the license file is included in the source distribution in future releases.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +45,49 @@  license: Apache-2.0
  # check later once the license file is included in the source distribution 
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
